statements: UPDATE player_accounts SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id=123456;
UPDATE player_accounts SET last_login='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE username='alice123';
UPDATE player_accounts SET username = 'new_username', last_login = '2022-10-15 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_accounts SET email = 'new_email@example.com', password = 'new_password', last_login = '2022-10-20 09:30:00' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE PlayerAccounts SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Authentication SET last_login = '2022-01-10 15:30:00' WHERE auth_id = 5;
UPDATE PlayerAccounts SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john_doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Authentication SET last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, token = 'abc123' WHERE auth_id = 2;
UPDATE player_stats SET game_wins = 10, game_losses = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_authentication SET access_token = 'new_access_token', last_login = '2022-03-15 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_stats SET total_games_played = total_games_played + 1, game_wins = game_wins + 1 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_authentication SET last_login = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', access_token = 'new_access_token' WHERE player_id = 67890;
UPDATE player_accounts SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE player_id=12345;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity=5, item_name='Sword' WHERE player_id=54321;
UPDATE player_accounts SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE username='JohnDoe';
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity=10 WHERE inventory_id=5;
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 500 WHERE player_id = 101 AND game_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 10, item_name = 'Sword' WHERE inventory_id = 201;
UPDATE players SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword' WHERE player_id=100;
UPDATE player_friends SET status='accepted' WHERE player_id=200 AND friend_id=201;
